events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it looks completely different and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Mike Johnson to handle the refund process for the customer.
Hello! I’m Mike from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you received.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 98237465. The jacket is still unused, and I have kept the tags and original packaging intact.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund once the jacket is returned. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to the return label for returning the product.
We have sent you the return label by email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be issued within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday using the provided label. Thank you again for your help and support!
Your refund has been successfully processed and should appear on your payment method within the next 2-3 business days.
We are closing your case now. Please reach out if you have further questions or need assistance in the future.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your refund experience. We appreciate your feedback to improve our services.
